mapper.update: insert into trans_req_mas ( reqno, coin_type, charge_cd, req_amt, charge_amt, tot_req_amt, send_coin, to_wallet_addr, dstnt_tag, depos_nm, phone_no, rsn_ctnt, device_type, referer_url, mod_dttm, prcs_cd, reg_dttm ) values ( #{reqno}, #{coinType }, #{chargeCd }, #{reqAmt }, #{chargeAmt }, #{totReqAmt }, #{sendCoin }, #{toWalletAddr }, #{dstntTag }, #{deposNm }, #{phoneNo }, #{rsnCtnt }, #{deviceType }, #{refererUrl }, #{modDttm }, #{prcsCd }, now() )
